Plot: A sheriff's deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.
Title: The One
Actors: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo, Jason Statham
tomatoConsensus: The One plays out more like a video game than a movie and borrows freely from other, better sci-fi actioners like the The Matrix. Also, Jet Li's martial arts abilities are buried under the editing and special effects.
